MALLOW: Daz: I have been trying to retrieve a conversation I wrote using a projection stone, with little progress.. Might you be able to access the data stored on it?
2 1
DAZ: Mallow, I'm afraid you misunderstand.. Conversations shared across projection stones are not recorded on the stone itself (like scrolls are) - they are recorded on the projection walls!
3 2
DAZ: The information is recorded onto the projection walls at both ends of the conversation, allowing Nomai at both ends to view the shared conversation using the corresponding projection stones.
4 3
DAZ: Think of each projection stone as a key, and each recorded conversation as unique locks - information that can only be retrieved with the corresponding projection stones.
5 3
MALLOW: In other words, I must locate the corresponding projection stones to access the information I seek.. No wonder I could not find so many conversations I had written before!
6 5
MALLOW: Your projection walls are far more sophisticated than I had imagined.. You have my gratitude for teaching me about them, my dear brother-by-proxy!
